Can you explain how to get a Verus address on a web browser?

You cannot get a Verus address on a web browser. Instead, you can get a Verus address using Verus Mobile, which is available on the App Store and Play Store, or Verus Desktop, which can be downloaded for Windows, macOS, Linux, or Linux ARM.

# Get a Verus address
There are a few ways to get a Verus address on desktop and on mobile.

## Verus Mobile
Download Verus Mobile from the [App Store](https://apps.apple.com/en/app/verus-mobile/id6447361908) or [Play Store](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.autonomoussoftwarefoundation.verusmobile.android&hl=en&gl=US)

Use Verus Mobile to bridge from Ethereum to Verus (or vice versa) all within the application. And use it for MEV-resistant and low-cost conversions: [more on Verus DeFi](/sendcurrency)

## Verus Desktop
Download Verus Desktop for Windows, macOS, Linux or Linux ARM [here](https://verus.io/wallet).

Run a full node (native mode) to experience all protocol features.
How do I use Verus Mobile to bridge from Bitcoin to Verus?
Verus Mobile cannot be used to bridge from Bitcoin to Verus. It can be used to bridge from Ethereum to Verus (or vice versa).

# Get a Verus address
There are a few ways to get a Verus address on desktop and on mobile.

## Verus Mobile
Download Verus Mobile from the [App Store](https://apps.apple.com/en/app/verus-mobile/id6447361908) or [Play Store](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.autonomoussoftwarefoundation.verusmobile.android&hl=en&gl=US)

Use Verus Mobile to bridge from Ethereum to Verus (or vice versa) all within the application. And use it for MEV-resistant and low-cost conversions: [more on Verus DeFi](/sendcurrency)

## Verus Desktop
Download Verus Desktop for Windows, macOS, Linux or Linux ARM [here](https://verus.io/wallet).

Run a full node (native mode) to experience all protocol features.
Is it possible to run a full node (native mode) on Verus Mobile?
No, you can run a full node (native mode) on Verus Desktop, not on Verus Mobile.

# Get a Verus address
There are a few ways to get a Verus address on desktop and on mobile.

Download Verus Mobile from the [App Store](https://apps.apple.com/en/app/verus-mobile/id6447361908) or [Play Store](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.autonomoussoftwarefoundation.verusmobile.android&hl=en&gl=US)

Use Verus Mobile to bridge from Ethereum to Verus (or vice versa) all within the application. And use it for MEV-resistant and low-cost conversions: [more on Verus DeFi](/sendcurrency)
